translation: Dhāraṇī of the Horse-Headed Avalokitêśvara Mind

source_sentence: 以隆　僧都本書寫之件本大師御筆(云云)後日以般若寺僧正御手跡本比交以朱付點本也。
translation: On the following day, he wrote a copy of the original master's royal pen (as it said), which was copied by the saṃgha at Prajñāpāramitā Temple with the traces of the monk's right royal hand and transmitted to the patched copy in vermilion.
